Merge pull request #324 from maxi0604/exec_run_tty

Change default value for tty in exec_run

Fix incorrect default value for tty in exec_run

According to the documentation comment below, this should
be set to False. Furthermore, this is the behavior of docker-py,
so it will be expected by many users.

Signed-off-by: Maximilian R <maxi.rostock@outlook.de>

Merge pull request #321 from hpvb/fix-image-scp

Fix image SCP when not providing quiet

Merge pull request #319 from andryyy/main

Fixes the secrets parameter, adds the secret_env parameter

Merge pull request #316 from containers/renovate/major-ci-vm-image

Update dependency containers/automation_images to v20230816

Fix image SCP when not providing quiet

Due to a logic error when trying to use the image scp functionality the
destination wasn't passed unless "quiet" was also set.

Signed-off-by: Hein-Pieter van Braam <hp@tmm.cx>

Change {k:v} to {k: v}

Signed-off-by: André Peters <andre.peters@debinux.de>

Fixes the secrets parameter, adds the secret_env parameter

- Minor typo fix out of context: "example :" to "example:"
- Secrets were not mounted correctly
- Add parameter secret_env to mount secrets as environment variable

Signed-off-by: André Peters <andre.peters@debinux.de>

Update dependency containers/automation_images to v20230816

Signed-off-by: renovate[bot] <29139614+renovate[bot]@users.noreply.github.com>

Merge pull request #310 from martinpitt/packit-temp-copr

packit: Build PRs into default packit COPRs

Merge pull request #311 from chnrxn/chnrxn-patch-1

remove direct logging to sys.stderr

remove unused import

Signed-off-by: chnrxn <cohawk@yahoo.com>

remove direct logging to sys.stderr

Signed-off-by: chnrxn <cohawk@yahoo.com>

packit: Build PRs into default packit COPRs

Building all PRs of all container projects into the same COPR does not
properly isolate PRs from each other.

To avoid that, change the copr_build configuration to use the packit
default COPRs, which are specific to the particular PR, and disappear
after a few weeks. Depending projects should only run against what
landed in podman-py/main i.e. the podman-next COPR.

Signed-off-by: Martin Pitt <mpitt@redhat.com>

Merge pull request #304 from umohnani8/4.7-dev

Bump version on main to 4.7.0-dev

Merge pull request #306 from lsm5/packit-downstream-package-name

Packit: mention `downstream_package_name: python-podman` in config

Packit: mention `downstream_package_name: python-podman` in config

The Fedora package name doesn't match upstream name. As a result, packit
cannot automatically detect the right package repo for downstream tasks
unless downstream_package_name is specified.

Success can only be verified in the next upstream release.

Ref: https://packit.dev/docs/configuration#downstream_package_name

Signed-off-by: Lokesh Mandvekar <lsm5@fedoraproject.org>

Bump version on main to 4.7.0-dev

Signed-off-by: Urvashi Mohnani <umohnani@redhat.com>

Merge pull request #303 from umohnani8/4.6

Bump version to v4.6.0

release-4.6.commit_message:
Merge pull request #307 from openshift-cherrypick-robot/cherry-pick-306-to-release-4.6

[release-4.6] Packit: mention `downstream_package_name: python-podman` in config

Packit: mention `downstream_package_name: python-podman` in config

The Fedora package name doesn't match upstream name. As a result, packit
cannot automatically detect the right package repo for downstream tasks
unless downstream_package_name is specified.

Success can only be verified in the next upstream release.

Ref: https://packit.dev/docs/configuration#downstream_package_name

Signed-off-by: Lokesh Mandvekar <lsm5@fedoraproject.org>
